channel.title: News on The Etherington Group
channel.description: Recent content in News on The Etherington Group

item.title: Marc talks at RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023
item.description: Marc presents some of the group’s latest work at the RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023 at the University of Strathclyde

item.title: Ruth presents a poster at the RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023
item.description: Ruth presents some of her latest research at the RSC Photophysics and Photochemistry Group Early Career Meeting 2023 at the University of Strathclyde

item.title: Fluorolog-QM's 2nd Birthday
item.description: We celebrate the 2nd Birthday of one of our crucial pieces of equipment.

item.title: Chris leaves the Group
item.description: Chris leaves the group for new pastures.

item.title: Article Published!
item.description: The first article in collaboration with Ewan Matheson and the NUPV group is published.

item.title: Take a Break
item.description: It’s always nice to have a coffee break with the team

item.title: Marc and Chris visit York
item.description: Marc and Chris have a trip to York to chat science with the McGonigal Group

item.title: Fabio Cucinotta visits the Group
item.description: Fabio Cucinotta from Newcastle University gives a seminar and visits the group to chat science.

item.title: Mark Thompson visits the Group
item.description: Mark Thompson from the University of Southern California visits Newcastle and the Group

item.title: Marc presents at the Lit&Phil
item.description: Marc gives an outreach talk at the Lit&Phil

item.title: Ruth presents at the 2023 PGR Conference
item.description: Ruth presents her research on the carbazole-pyridinium salts at the 2023 PGR Conference

item.title: Chris Hogg presents at Group Meeting
item.description: Chris presents his PhD work at our weekly Group Meeting

item.title: Chris Hogg Joins the Group
item.description: Chris Hogg joins the group as a Research Assistant

item.title: Preprint Submitted
item.description: Preprint of 2022 internally funded work uploaded to ChemRxiv.

item.title: Internal Funding Success
item.description: Success with internal funds for a research assistant supervised jointly with The Knowles Group.

item.title: Article Published!
item.description: collaborative work with Dr Iain Wright and Prof. Martin Bryce published in Chemistry A European Journal

item.title: New Module
item.description: We have developed a new module on Quantum and Molecular Photophysics for the 3rd Year students.

item.title: New Website
item.description: Welcome to the new website of the Etherington Group.

item.title: HORIBA Fluorolog-QM Installed
item.description: The latest Fluorolog-QM from HORIBA is now installed at Northumbria University.
